author: Nintendo of America
description:
With the power to play anytime, anywhere, Nintendo Switch 2 has you covered. Look forward to upcoming games from Capcom, FromSoftware, Square Enix, and more on Nintendo Switch 2 in 2026!  

#NintendoSwitch2

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Explore the paranormal in Phasmophobia from Kinetic Games, coming to Nintendo Switch 2 in 2026.

Calling all Ghost Hunters! Use your equipment to gather evidence in over 10 locations and sell your findings before you become part of the haunting yourself in this genre-defining co-op psychological horror game. 

#NintendoSwitch2 #Phasmophobia 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: Phasmophobia – Announcement Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is available now, only on Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch: https://ninten.do/6002tGvJC

Guide Samus Aran, one of the greatest hunters in the galaxy, as she explores an unknown planet to find a way home.

Nintendo Switch 2 players who have Metroid Prime 4: Beyond on Nintendo Switch can upgrade to the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition by purchasing the upgrade pack.

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Wishlist LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight, coming to Nintendo Switch 2 in 2026: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/lego-batman-legacy-of-the-dark-knight-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01  

Embark on Bruce Wayne’s journey to become the hero of Gotham City in this brand-new open-world action-adventure game. The latest LEGO adventure brings decades of Batman films, television, comic books, and games to life, complete with TT Games’ signature brand of fun-filled LEGO humor! 

#NintendoSwitch2 #LEGOBatmanGame  

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

title: LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight – Official Heroes & Villains Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Out of Words is coming to Nintendo Switch 2 in 2026. Wishlist now: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/out-of-words-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01  

Destiny awaits in this new handmade co-op game that will leave you speechless! Meet Kurt, Karla, and a magical cast of characters as they navigate a crumbling world called Vokabulantis. 

#NintendoSwitch2 #OutofWords

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Work together to save your space station in Orbitals, coming to Nintendo Switch 2 in 2026! 

Team up as explorers Maki and Omura to brave the perils of space and save their crumbling space station home from the dangers of a supernatural cosmic storm. As you navigate uncharted areas, teamwork is vital. The only way to save your home is to do it together! 

#NintendoSwitch2 #Orbitals 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s
